notes: This Excel file contains population projections for 2016 by the Yemen Central Statistical Organization. The projections are based off of 2004 Census data. The population figures are disaggregated by governorate and district levels, both containing p-codes. The data is further disaggregated by sex and age groups. Additional information on population figures that take into account internally displaced people and returnees in Yemen can be found here [https://www.humanitarianresponse.info/en/operations/yemen/protection] and is produced regularly by the Task Force on Population Movement.
